sql.Text: select count(a.UserID) from UserInfo as a @where

select top @pageSize * from (select row_number() over(order by @orderbyStr) as rownumber, a.UserID, a.UserName, a.UserPassword, a.UseActurlName, a.RolID, a.CompanyId, a.DepartmentId, a.UserTel, a.UserMobile, a.UserEmail from UserInfo as a @where ) as temp_table where rownumber between @pageSize*(@currentPageNo-1)+1 and @pageSize*(@currentPageNo)

select a.UserID as 用户ID, a.UserName as 登录名, a.UserPassword as 登录密码, a.UseActurlName as 真实姓名, a.RolID as 所属角色, a.CompanyId as 所在公司, a.DepartmentId as 所在部门, a.UserTel as 用户电话, a.UserMobile as 手机, a.UserEmail as 邮件 from UserInfo as a @where
